recipesJson.name: Koy Hole (Kinako Soy Donut)
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
A cinnamon sugar donut with a dusting of Kinako Soy Powder.

You get a lovely dried peanut powder flavor from the kinako soy, the avacado adds a lovely creamy/fatty mouth feel that actually goes quite nicely with the grittiness from the kinako soy.

Donut base is a donut base.

reviews.text: We need more of these asian flavours. This one is very tasty. Not is doughy as I expected, but a very fulfilling vape.

Fresh, this is such a unique and tasty recipe! I was a little concerned with the avocado in there but this turned out superb. It hasn't even steeped yet so I bet it will be even better once it has. Good Job!
